text: The train drew into another station and Cecil, with a further six stops to go, was left almost alone in the coach. He fumed as he recollected the long correspondence he had had with the Inland Revenue in an effort to obtain tax relief for a jacket used solely in the office. 'If the jacket is a condition of your employment,' the Inspector had written, 'it may qualify for relief.'
